thread.title: Buick Super Bowl Commercial 2017: Miranda Kerr & Cam Newton Transform!
thread.title_full: Buick Super Bowl Commercial 2017: Miranda Kerr & Cam Newton Transform!

author: Just Jared
title: Buick Super Bowl Commercial 2017: Miranda Kerr & Cam Newton Transform!
text:
The 2017 Super Bowl Commercial for Buick features Miranda Kerr and football player Cam Newton and you can check out the video right now.
In the commercial, two dads on watching their kids play football and watch a woman pull up to the field in a Buick. “Oh nice, but if that’s a Buick, then my kid’s Cam Newton ,” one dad says.
The kid then turns into Cam and plays incredibly well. 
After the game, Cam is talking to the coach and they point out another car. “If that’s a Buick, then I’m a supermodel,” the coach says before turning into Miranda !

Big Game Commercial with Cam Newton & Miranda Kerr | Buick Click inside to watch the 30 second version of the ad and a behind the scenes clip… 

“Not So Pee Wee Football” with Cam Newton & Miranda Kerr (:30 Version) | Buick 
Behind The Scenes of Buick’s Big Game Ad | Buick
